channel.title: operation on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in operation on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: The Dwarves Runs By Ideas
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Minimal human intervention Our operations runs on four branches: Account for client happiness arrangement - PeopleOps for resource allocation - Human Resource for recruitment and employee experience, & Communication for info transmission across the platforms.

item.title: Account
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Planning Many people would say in order to have a good plan; you need to write out all vibrant details.

item.title: Building A Solid High Performing Team
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Sustainable growth companies are built by teams of shining constellations rather than just several bright stars. It all starts with recruiting.

item.title: Hiring For Operations Team
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Operations is a very sensitive area of the company, so be very picky. A great ops person can dramatically improve the way your company works and make your life a lot easier.

item.title: Objective
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Operating a company is not much different from operating a machine or a system. The company has departments and people working together towards a goal as a car has many components connected by gears moving towards a destination.

item.title: Project Management
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: A Project Manager (PM) job starts right after a new project has been sealed and assigned with a starting date, a deadline and a Team.

item.title: Resource Assignment
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: With the nature of consulting team, one member could be assigned to multiple projects at once or handle the work of a member in one project that take more than 100% of his/her time per week.
